title: (x) "The Medicine Shoppe" swashy serif - Bookman Swash {Patricia}
content:
Just curious what font was used in the Medicine Shoppe logo.  
The M looks a bit like Adobe Caslon Italic Swash, but has its obvious differences.

 [‹ Recommendation for IMPACT alternative](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808145924/http:/typophile.com/node/19275 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Introducing" book serif face - Dolly {Mathieu Christe} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808145924/http:/typophile.com/node/19274 "Go to next forum topic")
author: gavinp

comments.content:
Looks like either the medium, demi or bold weight of Bookman Italic with Swash to me.

Here’s a showing.

[http://www.typophile.com/node/2833](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808145924/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2833 "http://www.typophile.com/node/2833")
